ComicInfo.Summary: Discovering the hidden location of Drakken, Waering sends Wetworks in to take him out. The team inadvertently interrupts a meeting the vampire lord is holding with Defile. The WildC.A.T.S. show up looking for Daemonites and find Wetworks instead.
